synthesis_analysis: The system excels at validating emotions and providing tailored, micro-step advice, effectively building trust and reducing pressure. Its main weakness is missing opportunities to address somatic symptoms and deeper anxieties with concrete coping strategies. To improve, immediately pair social scripts with physical regulation techniques (e.g., grounding) for co-regulation. The highest priority for evolution is proactively integrating physiological and deeper psychological support into its core empathetic process.
